system.description:
Having spent too much time around necromantic magic or the undead themselves, and it has now affected you in a more permanent way, and as such:

  • You gain the undead creature type.

  • You gain resistance to necrotic damage.

  • You gain immunity to both poison damage and the poisoned condition.

  • You no longer require sleep, but instead, during a long rest you sit or stand motionless for at least 4 hours. You remain conscious during this time. 

  • You do not need to eat or drink.

  • You suffer no ill effects from resurrection magic, and resurrection magic used on you does not require material components.
